<root><template><title>Command</title><part><name>Comments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> ofp </value></part><part><name>Game name</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00</value></part><part><name>Game version</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global </value></part><part><name>Multiplayer Arguments</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Control </value></part><part><name>GROUP1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Assign a unit as commander of a vehicle. Used together with [[orderGetIn]] to order subordinate units to get in as commander of a specific vehicle. Before usage of this command a subordinate unit hasn't got the option to get into the commander place of the vehicle. </value></part><part><name>DESCRIPTION</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> unitName '''assignAsCommander''' vehicleName</value></part><part><name>SYNTAX</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unitName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER1</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> vehicleName: [[Object]] </value></part><part><name>PARAMETER2</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]] </value></part><part><name>RETURNVALUE</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________
		  
</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <ext><name>pre</name><attr/><inner>_soldier1 assignAsCommander _tank
[_soldier1] orderGetIn true</inner><close></pre></close></ext> </value></part><part><name>EXAMPLE1</name>=<value>
____________________________________________________________________________________________

</value></part><part><name index="6"/><value> [[assignAsDriver]], [[assignAsGunner]], [[assignAsCargo]], [[assignAsTurret]], [[assignAsCargoIndex]], [[moveInCargo]], [[moveInCommander]], [[moveInDriver]], [[moveInGunner]], [[moveInTurret]], [[assignedVehicleRole]], [[assignedVehicle]], [[unassignVehicle]], [[leaveVehicle]] </value></part><part><name>SEEALSO</name>=<value>

</value></part></template>
